overview: In the year 2038, the world has fallen into a dystopia. A rise in authoritarianism has forced some to live on the outskirts of society. Isaac (28), a deadbeat with little ambition, must accompany his estranged sister Taylor (16) to safety. Hiding in a heavily monitored abandoned airport overnight, Taylor endures loud panic attacks whenever her video game console dies out. Therefore, Isaac and Taylor must find replacement batteries in time for pick-up, whilst evading patrollers, and facing their past.
tagline: A deadbeat older brother must accompany his estranged sister to safety while searching for supplies in an abandoned, dystopian airport.
title: Wish You Were Here
